cockatrice_carddatabase.cards:
CW01 — Tunnel Prospector SVP W W 1 Creature - Human Scout 1/1 2 1W: Tunnel Prospector gets +1/+1 and can’t be blocked until end of turn.
CW02 — Scampering Warden SVP W W 1 Creature - Squirrel 1/1 2 When Scampering Warden enters or dies, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
CW03 — Beloved Creation SVP W 1W 2 Creature - Elemental Construct 1/3 2 When Beloved Creation enters, make it snow. (Whenever it snows, create a 2/2 white Elemental creature token with decayed.)
CW04 — Wilderness Explorer SVP W 1W 2 Creature - Human Ranger 1/1 2 Whenever a land enters under your control, you gain 1 life.
CW05 — Professional Mechanics SVP W 1W 2 Creature - Human Artificer 2/2 2 Whenever Professional Mechanics crews a vehicle, that vehicle gains vigilance until end of turn.
CW06 — Toothed Remnant SVP W 2W 3 Creature - Cat Beast 3/2 2 As long as eight or more cards are in your graveyard, Toothed Remnant has first strike.
CW07 — Herald of Frost SVP W 2W 3 Enchantment Creature - Elemental Archon 1/3 2 2, T, This costs 2 less to activate as long as the weather is snowy: Tap target creature.
CW08 — Resolute Strikers SVP W 1WW 3 Creature - Human Scout 2/2 2 Whenever you cast a rusty spell, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (Artifacts, Artificers, and Scouts are rusty.)
CW09 — Ursine Logger SVP W 2WW 4 Creature - Bear 2/3 2 When Ursine Logger enters, search your library for a basic Plains card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
CW10 — Indignant Apparition SVP W 3W 4 Creature - Bear Spirit 4/3 2 When you discard Indignant Apparition, you may pay W. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s 1/1.
CW11 — Black-Winged Eagle SVP W 4W 5 Enchantment Creature - Bird 3/3 2 Flying Whenever a land enters under your control, Black-Winged Eagle gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
CW12 — Gracious Barkeep SVP W 3WW 5 Creature - Human Citizen 4/4 2 Whenever Gracious Barkeep attacks, if the weather is snowy, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
CW13 — Freeze to Death SVP W 2W 3 Sorcery 3 Destroy target tapped creature. Make it snow. (Whenever it snows, create a 2/2 white Elemental creature token with decayed.)
CW14 — Stunned by the City SVP W 1W 2 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature or planeswalker Enchanted permanent can’t attack or block and its abilities can’t be activated.
CW15 — Autumnal Fall SVP W 1W 2 Sorcery 3 Destroy target creature with power or toughness 4 or greater. If you control five or more lands, scry 2.
CW16 — Fight Back SVP W W 1 Instant 3 Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If that creature is rusty, it gets an additional +1/+1 until end of turn. (Artifacts, Artificers, and Scouts are rusty.)
CW17 — Reliable Tractor SVP W 2W 3 Artifact - Vehicle 1 Whenever Reliable Tractor attacks, untap another target attacking creature. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
CW18 — Moving Day SVP W 2W 3 Enchantment 1 At the beginning of your end step, if you’ve cast two or more rusty spells this turn, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. (Artifacts, Artificers, and Scouts are rusty.)
CW19 — Spontaneous Breakdown SVP W 2W 3 Instant 3 Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If the weather is snowy, exile that permanent instead. You gain 2 life.
CU01 — Subway Courser SVP U U 1 Creature - Human Ranger 1/1 2 As long as the weather is snowy, Subway Courser can’t be blocked. Whenever Subway Courser deals combat damage to a player, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, scry 1.
CU02 — White-Tailed Welder SVP U 1U 2 Creature - Elk Artificer 2/1 2 When White-Tailed Welder enters, create an Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and equip 1.
CU03 — Sage of the Mists SVP U 1U 2 Creature - Human Wizard 1/1 2 Whenever the weather changes, Sage of the Mists gets +1/+0 and gains hexproof until end of turn.
CU04 — Market Analyst SVP U 2U 3 Creature - Cat Noble 3/2 2 Vigilance Whenever you cast a rusty spell, scry 1. (Artifacts, Artificers, and Scouts are rusty.)
CU07 — Wintry Amalgam SVP U 2UU 4 Creature - Elemental 1/1 2 When Wintry Amalgam enters, make it snow. (Whenever it snows, create a 2/2 white Elemental creature token with decayed.) Whenever you create one or more tokens, put a +1/+1 counter on Wintry Amalgam.
CU08 — Airborne Drifters SVP U 4U 5 Creature - Elemental Jellyfish 4/3 2 Flying As long as you control two other Elementals, Airborne Drifters has hexproof.
CU09 — Icebound Owl SVP U 5U 6 Creature - Bird 3/4 2 Flying When Icebound Owl enters, make it snow, then make it snow again. (Whenever it snows, create a 2/2 white Elemental creature token with decayed.)
CU10 — The Great Road Westward SVP U 2UU 4 Instant 3 Counter target spell. Basic landcycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
CU11 — Defog SVP U 1U 2 Instant 3 Counter target spell unless its controller pays 2. You may clear the weather.
CU12 — Decrepit Gas Station SVP U U 1 Artifact 1 When Decrepit Gas Station enters, draw a card. 3U: Scry 2.
CU05 — Fledgling Meteomancer SVP U 2U 3 Creature - Human Wizard 1/1 2 When Fledgling Meteomancer enters, change the weather. (Clear the weather or make it sunny, snowy, or stormy)
CU13 — Turn on the TV SVP U 2U 3 Instant 3 Draw two cards.
CU14 — Blown Away SVP U 2U 3 Instant 3 Return target creature to its owner’s hand. You may change the weather. (Clear the weather or make it sunny, snowy, or stormy)
CU15 — Troposhield SVP U U 1 Instant 3 If you changed the weather this turn, you may copy this spell and choose new targets for the copy. Up to one target creature you control phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don’t exist until its controller’s next turn.)
CU17 — Buried by Snow SVP U U 1 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 1/1. As long as it’s snowy, enchanted creature loses all abilities and creature types.
CU18 — Expansive Vistas SVP U 4UU 6 Enchantment 1 When Expansive Vistas enters, draw three cards. 3U, Sacrifice Expansive Vistas, Activate only a a sorcery: Create two 2/2 green Elemental creature tokens.
CU06 — Venatorus Borealis SVP U 3U 4 Creature - Elemental Beast 2/3 2 When Venatorus Borealis enters, draw a card.
CU16 — Stripped-Down Mall SVP U 2U 3 Artifact 1 When Stripped-Down Mall enters, create a colorless artifact token with “T: Add C. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.” 2U: Target creature can’t be blocked this turn.
CB01 — Alley Gang Enforcer SVP B B 1 Creature - Human Assassin 1/1 2 Whenever you cast a rusty spell, Alley Gang Enforcer gains deathtouch until the beginning of your next turn. (Artifacts, Artificers, and Scouts are rusty.)
CB02 — Big City Anarchist SVP B 1B 2 Creature - Human Warrior 2/1 2 Whenever you cast a rusty spell, Big City Anarchist gets +1/+0 until end of turn. (Artifacts, Artificers, and Scouts are rusty.)
CB03 — Arachnitricity SVP B 1B 2 Enchantment Creature - Elemental Spider 2/2 2 When Arachnitricity enters, make it storm. (Whenever it storms, discard a card, then draw a card.)

CB05 — Scourge of Rush Hour SVP B 2B 3 Creature - Cat Artificer 3/1 2 Whenever Scourge of Rush Hour crews a vehicle, that vehicle gains menace until end of turn.
CB06 — Corner Store Butcher SVP B 2B 3 Creature - Human Citizen 2/1 2 When Corner Store Butcher enters, each player sacrifices a creature. When Corner Store Butcher dies, you gain 2 life.
CB07 — Inner-City Necromancer SVP B 2BB 4 Creature - Human Warlock 3/3 2 When Inner-City Necromancer enters, exile up to two target creature cards from a graveyard and you gain 2 life. If the weather is stormy, you may return those cards to their owner’s hand instead.
CB08 — Executive of Production SVP B 3B 4 Creature - Human Noble 4/2 2 Whenever you cast a rusty spell, Executive of Production deals 2 damage to each opponent. (Artifacts, Artificers, and Scouts are rusty.)

CB13 — Taken by the Grain SVP B 1B 2 Sorcery 3 Destroy target creature with toughness 3 or less.
CB14 — Town of Ghosts SVP B B 1 Sorcery 3 As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a rusty permanent. (Artifacts, Artificers, and Scouts are rusty.) Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
CB15 — Lose All Hope SVP B 2B 3 Sorcery 3 Choose one— • Target player discards two cards. • Target player sacrifices a creature.
CB16 — Crushing Disappointment SVP B 3B 4 Instant 3 Each player loses 2 life. You draw two cards.
CB17 — Evil Spreads Again SVP B B 1 Instant 3 You may make it storm. (Whenever it storms, discard a card, then draw a card.) Return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
CB18 — Soul Stratiform SVP B 2B 3 Sorcery 3 When you cast this spell, if the weather is stormy, copy it. Soul Stratiform deals 2 damage to target player and you gain 2 life.

CR05 — Geminozoa SVP R 1RR 3 Enchantment Creature - Elemental Jellyfish 2/2 2 As long as it’s your turn, Geminozoa has flying. When you discard Geminozoa, you may pay 1R. If you do, create a token copy of it, except it’s 1/1.
CR06 — Playful Companion SVP R 2R 3 Creature - Dog 1/2 2 Playful Companion enters with a +1/+1 counter on it. 2, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Playful Companion: Target creature an opponent controls can’t block this turn.

CR09 — Rambunctious Runaways SVP R 3R 4 Creature - Human Dog 2/3 2 Haste Whenever Rambunctious Runaways attacks, as long as eight or more cards are in your graveyard, create a 1/1 red Squirrel token that’s tapped and attacking.
CR10 — Skullcaster Adept SVP R 3RR 5 Creature - Cat Warlock 4/4 2 When Skullcaster Adept attacks, you may exile up to one noncreature card from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Skullcaster Adept.
CR11 — Elemental of Sorrow SVP R 4RR 6 Creature - Elemental 5/5 2 This spells costs 2 less to cast as long as long as eight or more cards are in your graveyard. Haste
CR12 — Sunburn SVP R R 1 Sorcery 3 Sunburn deals 2 damage to target creature. If the weather is sunny, Sunburn deals 4 damage instead.
CR13 — Merciless Heatwave SVP R 2R 3 Instant 3 This spell can’t be countered. Merciless Heatwave deals 3 damage to any target. Clear the weather. When you discard Merciless Heatwave, you may pay R. If you do, Merciless Heatwave deals 1 damage to any target.
CR14 — Elchir's Offer SVP R 1RR 3 Sorcery 3 Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste. If the weather is stormy, that creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
CR15 — School Day's End SVP R 2R 3 Instant 3 Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. If the weather is sunny, creatures you control also gain trample until end of turn.
CR16 — Changing Winds SVP R 1R 2 Sorcery 3 Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. Changing Winds deals 1 damage to each opponent. Flashback 1RR (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
CR17 — Scrapyard Armaments SVP R 1R 2 Artifact - Equipment 1 When Scrapyard Armaments enters, attach it to target creature you control. Equipped creature gets +2/+0. As long as eight or more cards are in your graveyard, it gets +3/+2 instead. Equip 4
CR18 — Back Alley Smackdown SVP R 1R 2 Instant 3 Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. Then if the weather is stormy, that creature gets an additional +1/+0 until end of turn.
CR19 — Fateful Ride SVP R 1R 2 Sorcery 3 Change the weather. When you do, up to one target creature can’t block until end of turn. (Clear the weather or make it sunny, snowy, or stormy)

CG03 — Huntsmen of Tradition SVP G 1G 2 Creature - Human Ranger 2/2 2 Reach When Huntsmen of Tradition enters, you may have it fight target creature an opponent controls with flying. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

CG06 — Pride of the Town SVP G 2G 3 Creature - Cat Gamer Warrior 3/3 2 Vigilance As long as it’s sunny, Pride of the Town has trample.
